title: Years to days
description: Write a programme to convert years to days
contentHtml:
Write a programme to convert years to days

Input : 1
Output : 365

// Write a programme to convert years to days
#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int years, days;

    printf("Years : ");
    scanf("%d", &years);
    days = years * 365;
    printf("Days  : %d\n", days);
    return 0;
}


// Write a programme to convert years to days
using System;

public class YearsToDays
{
    static void Main(string[] args)
    {
        int YearsToDays(int years)
        {
            return years * 365;
        }

        // Input number of years
        Console.Write("Years : ");
        int years = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());

        // Days output
        Console.WriteLine("Days  : " + YearsToDays(years));
    }
}


# Computes the amount of days of a number of years

years = int(input("years : "))
print(f"\ndays  : {years * 365}")


// Write a programme to convert years to days
import java.util.Scanner;

public class YearsToDays {

  public static int yearToDays(int year) {
    return year * 365;
  }

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

    System.out.print("Years : ");
    int years = sc.nextInt();
    System.out.println("Days  : " + yearToDays(years));
    sc.close();
  }
}


// Write a programme to convert years to days
#include <iostream>

int main(void)
{
    double years;
    std::cout << "Years : ";
    std::cin >> years;
    std::cout << "Days  : " << (int)(years * 365) << std::endl;
    return 0;
}
